scripts.add-description-message: echo "\x1b[30m\x1b[103mADD A DESCRIPTION TO THE NEW RELEASE ON GITHUB\x1b[0m"
scripts.push:patch: npm run transpile && npm run build && git add -A && git status -s && git commit -m 'Transpiled latest build. Built Latest Bundle' && npm version patch && git push origin --tags && git push && npm run add-description-message -s
scripts.push:minor: npm run transpile && npm run build && git add -A && git status -s && git commit -m 'Transpiled latest build. Built Latest Bundle' && npm version minor && git push origin --tags && git push && npm run add-description-message -s
scripts.push:major: npm run transpile && npm run build && git add -A && git status -s && git commit -m 'Transpiled latest build. Built Latest Bundle' && npm version major && git push origin --tags && git push && npm run add-description-message -s
